name: Arm the Cathars
originalText: Until end of turn, target creature gets +3/+3, up to one other target creature gets +2/+2, and up to one other target creature gets +1/+1. Those creatures gain vigilance until end of turn.

rulings.text: If you choose three targets as you cast Arm the Cathars, all three targets must be different creatures.
